data.title: SOX Section 302.2 - 302.3: Prevent data tampering
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" | fields xdm.observer.*

data.title: SOX Section 302.4.B: Track Data Access
data.phrase:
/*tamodel | filter xdm.auth.auth_method contains "" |fields xdm.auth.**/

datamodel 
| filter xdm.target.location.region contains "" 
| fields xdm.target.agent.identifier, xdm.target.asn.as_name, xdm.target.asn.as_number, xdm.target.host.fqdn, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.location.city, xdm.target.location.continent, xdm.target.location.country, xdm.target.location.latitude, xdm.target.location.longitude , xdm.target.location.region
| comp count(xdm.target.location.country) as counter by xdm.target.location.country 
| view graph type = map xaxis = xdm.target.location.country yaxis = counter default_limit = `false` seriestitle("counter","Volume")

data.title: SOX Section 302.4.C: Validate systems are operational
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" 
| filter xdm.observer.version != "7.8.0.64267"
| fields xdm.observer.*
| comp count () as NON_COMPLIANT_VERSION
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped header = "Agent check in the past 24 hours without compliant policy" xaxis = NON_COMPLIANT_VERSION yaxis = NON_COMPLIANT_VERSION

command.name: header
command.value: "Agent check in the past 24 hours without compliant policy"

data.title: SOX Section 302.5.A - 302.5.B: Detect Security Breaches
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" | fields xdm.observer.*
